summary: An Ordinance granting to The Seattle Electric Company, its successors and assigns, permission to plank the alley between Sixth and Seventh Avenues on the south side of Olive Street in Block three (3) Sarah A. Bell's Addition, from the south line of Olive Street to distance of one hundred eighty (180) feet, to the south line of lots four (4) and nine 99) of said block three (3), and establishing certain grades for said alleys.
